name: wnba_schedule
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wnba_api.
Tool description: This API offer every basketball fan an easy way to stay on top of the latest data for all operations and players in the WNBA. It covers scores, stats, standings, and statistics.
API description: This endpoint provides you with the WNBA schedule data for a specified date as long as it is available.

month.description: The month for which to retrieve the schedule, as a string.

day.description: The day for which to retrieve the schedule, as a string.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the schedule, as a string.
